# Basic Azure DevOps Team Example

This fixture demonstrates a minimal Azure DevOps team configuration for tests.

## Features

- Creates a single Azure DevOps team
- Uses a random suffix to avoid name collisions

## Key Configuration

Use this fixture for fast, low-impact tests.

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
